       throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
Constructor

Parameters:
pos - Coordinates in metres specifying where the player spawns.
world - The JBox world in which the players physical body should be added.

Method Detail

moveXDir

public void moveXDir(float dir_x,
                     float delta)
Tell the player to move in a certain direction.

Parameters:
dir_x - The direction (and scale) of which to move. Should be [-1,1], which corresponds to [FullLeft, FullRight]
delta - Number of milliseconds since last update.
